channel.title: Walks on Grainy Photos
channel.description: Recent content in Walks on Grainy Photos

item.title: El Torcal de Antequera, Spain
item.description: Fifteen photos from El Torcal de Antequera, an area of outstanding natural beauty and arguably the best examples of karst limestone formation in Europe.

item.title: A stroll above Soportújar (Dam 24)
item.description: A spectacular walk high above Soportújar with stunning views. See 15 film photos shot with a Nikon FE2 from the walk, including the impressive 30 m waterfall on the Chico River.
